title: Bollywood celebrities Bhatt, Shabana condemn attack
text:
Mumbai, October 12
Criticising the paint-smearing attack, Bollywood celebrities Shabana Azmi and Mahesh Bhatt, among others, called it a shameful incident for a democratic country like India. Filmmaker Bhatt said the attack makes one wonder about India's democratic status. "The attack on Sudhendra Kulkarni ridicules our constitution, shames our police, & debunks our claims to be a democracy," Bhatt posted on Twitter. Shabana tweeted, "Deeply saddened by Shiv Senas attack on Sudheendra Kulkarni. Wish to talk to @uddhavthackeray and @AUThackeray but neither is talking my calls." "Dear Shiv Sena, Throwing paint on Sudheerna Kulkarni doesn't make you patriotic. If you remotely care, help fight our biggest enemy- poverty," singer Sona Mohapatra posted.
